sentences.en: Have you been talking to that crazy green gypsy in the giant paperweight?
sentences.cn: 等等,你们跟在巨大纸镇里的那个绿色疯吉普赛人讲过话了 吗 ?

sentences.en: He anchored the papers on the desk with a paperweight.
sentences.cn: 他用镇纸压住桌上的文件.

sentences.en: His eye fell on the fragments of the glass paperweight.
sentences.cn: 他的眼光落到了玻璃镇纸的碎片上.

sentences.en: The paperweight had fallen onto the desk, badly marking the surface.
sentences.cn: 镇纸掉到了桌上, 在桌面砸出了深深的印痕.

sentences.en: The room was darkening. He turned over towards the light and lay gazing into the glass paperweight.
sentences.cn: 屋子里开始发暗, 他转身凑着光亮,盯着玻璃镇纸看.

trans.tran_en: a small heavy object used to hold pieces of paper in place
